channel.title: Schedule on FOSS4G Europe 2026
channel.description: Recent content in Schedule on FOSS4G Europe 2026

item.title: Guided tours
item.description:
Guided tours (TBD)

Guided tours are planned to introduce Timișoara’s rich, multicultural history. The tours are planned to be organized by the Geography Department together with the Municipality of Timișoara.

item.title: Community Sprint
item.description:
Dates: TBD

FOSS4G Europe 2026 is planning to host the OSGeo community sprint.

item.title: Social dinner
item.description:
Social dinner (TBD)

The social dinner is planned for the second conference day.

item.title: Pub race
item.description:
Pub race (TBD)

The aim of the pub race is to dive you in the social backbone of Timișoara. Based on our experience and on our students’ recommendations, we will prepare a list of recommended pubs, restaurants, cafes and bars.

item.title: Excursion
item.description:
Recaș Winery Trip (optional, TBD)

We aim to organize an optional excursion to the Recaș Winery.

item.title: Talks
item.description: The talks schedule will be published closer to the event.

item.title: Business-to-business
item.description:
Date: Tuesday, 30 June 2026 (proposed)

Business-to-business (B2B) event (TBD)

The B2B event is planned to be organized on Tuesday and hosted at ICAM.

item.title: Ice-Breaker
item.description:
Ice breaker (TBD)

The purpose of the ice breaker is to build trust, energy, and community.

item.title: GeoChicas event
item.description:
GeoChicas event (TBD)

GeoChicas are an international women’s mapping community with members in more than 12 different countries. Our aim is for women to have a greater presence and participation in key OSM events, increase female participation and leadership, and work on mapping projects which benefit women. Our main focus as a group is to help close the gender gap in the OSM community across participation, data creation and curation.

item.title: Birds-of-a-Feather
item.description:
Thursday (2 July), Friday (3 July) 2026 (proposed)
Birds of a Feather (BoF) sessions are unstructured timeslots where people can self-organise themselves to discuss topics of interest. So, if there are any specific topics you’d like to discuss face-to-face with other people this is exactly the chance.

item.title: Family-friendly activities
item.description: Family-friendly activities will be published closer to the event.
